description: This file defines the NoteRepository interface for accessing Note data in the notes backend, with in-memory implementation details.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for Note data access, providing methods to save, find, delete, and check existence of notes.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves a Note object, returning the saved Note.

methods.name: findById
methods.description: Finds a Note by its UUID, returning an Optional of Note.

methods.name: findAll
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all Notes.

methods.name: deleteById
methods.description: Deletes a Note by its UUID.

methods.name: existsById
methods.description: Checks if a Note exists with the given UUID.
